text: Hélder Joaquim Máximo Catalão, known as Hélder (born 1 May 1955) is a former Portuguese football player. He played 17 seasons and 335 games in the Primeira Liga for Braga, Académico de Viseu, Beira-Mar and Académica de Coimbra. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Académica de Coimbra on 11 May 1975 in a game against CUF Barreiro. ==References== ==External links== Category:1955 births Category:People from Abrantes Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Associação Académica de Coimbra – O.A.F. players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Académico de Viseu F.C. players Category:LigaPro players Category:S.C. title: Hélder Catalão
